resources.string:
Always see long screenshots of movie lines made by others on the Internet? Want to make one yourself? Is it cumbersome to cut and splicing one by one?

With the VideoshotPro, you can watch the video while watching the screenshot, and your screenshots have been processed after the video is played.

Can be used to create movie graphics, movie dialogue images, etc., can also be used to capture any frame of the video in the video.

Not only that, VideoshotPro also provides the ability to intercept GIF, add text functions anywhere in the screenshot.

For the screenshot er, we provide a frame-by-frame selection feature, and it is no longer soft because you want to capture a flashing picture!

For the image quality er, we provide the original video quality function!

For enthusiasts, we have a custom FFmpeg command!



More features waiting for you to explore! 
You could check your picture in %1$s

Please enter your comments or problems encountered in use
Please be sure to enter your contact information (such as email)
Submit successfully! We will contact you later.
Failed to send feedback! Please check your network connection or grant access to this app. If you still can not send after retrying, please choose to send by yourself.
I am very sorry, the server failed, you can choose to try again or send by yourself.
You should allowed %1$s to use storage permissions to save your picture
Unless you allow storage permission to me, I can save your picture~
To use this, you need allow display pop-up window,allow now?\n\n

This mode is used to stitch the screenshots in your mobile phone. The best width of the selected images is the same, otherwise there will be white edges affecting the beauty of the picture. 


 How to use: 

 According to the prompt, check the picture you want to splicing. After checking the box, select “Finish” in the upper right corner.

"This mode allows you to take screenshots anywhere, even if you use other apps to play videos, you can also make movie subtitles. 


 How to use: 

 	 After selecting this mode, we will display a float button. At this point, you can go to other apps to start watching videos online. When you need to take a screenshot, just click the float button. 

 	 When the image has been completely intercepted, you can click the “Click to start production” button in the notification bar to make it. "

This mode can quickly extract all the frames of the video at specified intervals, so that users can choose a satisfactory screenshot. \n How to use: \nSelect the video and click the button to mark the starting position. Click the button again to mark the ending position, so the app will automatically start capturing.
Sorry, there is no so library compatible with your phone
"You downloaded an illegally packaged version,may you should go to the google play to re-download "
The current system version is too low to use this feature!
Unable to start the screenshot, please contact the developer to solve!
The movie line caption picture is doing this!
I recommend you also use the VideoShotPro app to quickly create a movie dialogue!
The first startup needs to be initialized, please slide the screen to refresh the data.
"No picture, just click on the bottom right corner and start making! "
Click this button to start making ~
The picture you made will be displayed here\n click to view the big picture\n long press to share and delete.
Share failed: authentication failed! Please contact the developer to resolve.
Share failed: sharing of the content is not supported.
At least one picture needs to be taken!
End time must be greater than start time
Sorry, the file failed to load: the file is invalid, please try again!
Sorry, the file failed to load: no permission, please try again!
Sorry, file loading failed: file format is not supported or other errors, please try again!
All pictures are marked oh~\nClick on the top right corner to start compositing~
Click to retract the previous step~
Click to add text to the image~
Click on the image to view the big picture~
Click here to open this tip~
Click here to go to the next step~

Sorry, your device is out of memory and we are unable to continue working.
 
Select Exit will exit this production. At this time, you can choose to reduce the number of pictures to make it again or go to settings - picture quality and performance. Reduce the quality of the exported picture and make it again.
 
Select Continue will automatically reduce the quality of the exported image and try again. If the memory is still out of memory or the quality of the exported image is too low, please select EXIT then manually set the quality of the exported image after
Get an image error! Please try again!
Sharing failed, please try to share in the sharing -> more WeChat to share
Click to open the edit mode~
Click to go to the next step~
In the edit mode, you can click to delete the picture which needless~ Press the edit button again to exit the edit mode~
Long press and drag to change the picture order~\nClick to open the preview~\nLong press on the preview interface to save a single picture~
Modify the quality of the final generated image. This setting will affect the performance of the app. If the app crashes frequently, please modify the setting
Is add a watermark after the image is synthesized\n
Is save as jpg when capturing images (using jpg can greatly reduce the image size, but the quality will be slightly reduced)
Is show/hide the interface when playing in full screen
Is preview in real time when synthesizing pictures (may overflow after flashing, it is recommended to close)
Is sort the image after the interception is completed
If you don\'t know what the settings are, don\'t change this setting to avoid the app not working properly due to improper settings
Detect the black border settings in the screenshot
Is automatically remove black borders when non-local video screenshots, if the screenshot is incomplete, please close this item
Single line allows the most non-black points
The minimum number of consecutive black edges
Change the export image color mode

Select whether to change the color mode. The quality of the picture is decremented from top to bottom. If the memory is insufficient to flash back, please change to the latter option. (This option is not available for all images)
Select whether to change the resolution of the exported image. If the memory is insufficient to flash back, please lower the resolution
Select whether to compress the image when exporting (only reduce the quality, do not change the resolution)
Long press to intercept the animation
Is hold the shot button to apture the GIF animation
Motion resolution(It is not recommended to open the original image for HD video and high resolution mobile phones)
Motion frame rate(It is not recommended to turn on the original frame rate for HD video and high resolution phones)
Allows the interception of the animation for the shortest time
When using Screenshot on other APP, Click to start
Click LOGO to give the author five-star~
Click the version to check for updates~
Click to view the update history~

Dear user, it is my greatest pleasure to have your app get your favor. If you want to support my work, please recommend this app to your friends~ (Click on the recommended side of the home page to recommend to your friend. Quickly share)
 If you want to donate, click the Alipay or WeChat button below, the program will automatically save the QR code to your mobile phone, and automatically open Alipay or WeChat, you just need to open the Alipay or WeChat sweep and scan Just save the QR code. 
 Important note: Please check if the transfer account is Alipay: 方程 (*芳程); WeChat:equationl (**程), to avoid unnecessary trouble caused by mistakes. 
 At the same time, this app is open source, welcome to contribute code or star~
 Open source address: https://github.com/equationl/video_shot_pro
Delete picture fail, please try again!
Would you like delete all pictures which you selected?
You have no select any picture
Are you sure not save any picture?
" Failed to load video! Do not use a third-party program to select videos! Please try to select a video from the system document!"
" Attempt to record GIF failed: setMediaProjection_fail"
" Recording is successful and is being converted to GIF…"
Create GIF: start scanning the video
Enabling this option will greatly improve the quality of the GIF, but will also greatly increase the size of the generated animation and the time required for generation.
Initialization of the recognition library failed:
To use this feature, you need to download about 40MB of offline data packets. Do you want to download them now?

When using the cloud engine for recognition, each of your screenshots will be uploaded for analysis. We guarantee that your data will not be saved. If you still mind, please switch to the offline engine. Note: Because the Cloud Engine API has a daily call limit, there may be issues that are not available.

Whether to use the cloud engine instead of the local offline recognition library, when opened, it will greatly improve the recognition accuracy rate, but will upload the captured image to the cloud for analysis.

This mode automatically recognizes subtitles in the video and captures, crops, and composites. If you use the offline engine for identification, you need to download additional identification packets. If the default offline engine recognition rate is not ideal, it is recommended to enable the cloud engine in Settings - Advanced Settings.\n At present, only pure Chinese subtitles or bilingual subtitles are supported.
Whether to cut off the extra bottom edge during the synthesis, it is recommended to open this item for videos with higher captions.
Copy QR picture fail! Please try again!
Please do not launch the app directly, please click on the notification to start!
"Whether to cut the left and right black edges when trimming, and only the upper and lower black edges when not cutting "
